Here is something new I’m going to try: Get an assignment in school and not do it. I’m going to do something better, something more creative and inventive. Why not? Should I get a D it just may be the best D ever. It will be a D in obedience and an A in being unique, different and creative. Are you being creative? Are you being trained to respond to the rules? Are you getting A’s at doing what your told? Is this what you dreamed of as a kid? Doing what your told? Being the best at following the rules? I hope not. Think about it, disobey.
